summary: Makes Stump, the dog in Riverwood, Essential and Respawnable. (forum request)
descriptionHtml:
Here\'s a small mod done because of a request by Amoryenar.

Makes Stump the Dog, found in Riverwood, Essential and Respawnable, just in case he died before installing this.  I haven\'t tested the respawn myself, but he should show back up in a week, give or take a few days, after loading this mod.


-----------
Install
------------
Install with NMM

Or

Drop Essential Stump the Dog.esp into your ...Skyrim/Data folder, and check the box in your load order manager.


-----------
Bugs
-----------
None that I know of, this is a pretty simple mod.  Comment if anything weird happens, or if there is any incompatibilities with anything, but there shouldn\'t be, because I doubt there are any other mods that mess with one random dog NPC.
author: Dudeman325
